comment: Review complete. SOP-005 meets all review criteria: (1) Purpose and scope are clear and well-defined. (2) Definitions are complete and accurate - six key terms defined. (3) Procedures are actionable and unambiguous - clear workflows for Execution Branch and Genesis Sandbox models, adoption process, versioning, and traceability. (4) Three ASCII diagrams are clear and helpful. (5) Document follows SOP format conventions. Content accurately reflects CR-010 proposed content. Recommend approval.

Review complete with explicit frontmatter verification per CAPA-002. FRONTMATTER CHECK: (1) title field present - PASS. (2) revision_summary field present - PASS. (3) revision_summary references authorizing CR (CR-010) - PASS. (4) Format complies with SOP-001 Section 5.1 and SOP-002 Section 8 - PASS. The nonconformance identified in INV-002 has been corrected. Document content unchanged from v1.0. Recommend approval.

COMPLIANT. Full verification of CR-015 EI-3 changes: (1) Frontmatter: title='Code Governance', revision_summary='CR-015: Align SDLC document types with SOP-006', (2) DS.md removed from repository structure examples (lines 86-90 now show only RS.md and RTM.md), (3) Key Principles line 99 shows '(RS, RTM)' not '(DS, RTM)', (4) Adoption CR scope line 198 shows '(RS, RTM)' not '(RS, DS, RTM)', (5) Workflow diagram lines 227-228 show only RS.md and RTM.md, (6) SDLC document references comment (line 289) updated to 'RS.md or RTM.md', (7) Line 295 says 'The document describes' not 'The DS describes', (8) Section 10.2 (lines 318-320) no longer has 'DS references implementation files'. Full document scan confirms no remaining DS/CS/OQ references. No placeholder content. Recommend for approval.
